name: Sow
description: You throw out a poison seed that bursts into thorny death.

effects.result: Your foe is sealed.
You foe is marked. When marked, and after you attack your marked foe thereafter, bless yourself or an ally in range 3 of your target.
Summon a Thrall adjacent to your target.
Repeat the effect.
You can make this melee attack against the target marked by Sow regardless of distance or line of sight. It also gains *unerring* if made this way.

talents.name: i
talents.description: *Effect*: If Sow’s marked foe is defeated, it can be transferred to a different foe in range 3 from that foe.

mastery.name: Spectral Scythe
mastery.description: Reap and Sow also create an arc 4 *area effect* drawn from your target as the origin space, that cannot include your target. Foes inside take 2 *piercing* damage, and allies inside gain 2 vigor.

name: Growing Season
description: Blow magical spores in the air, which are disturbed by the chaos of combat. Where they fall, the fruit of life and death blooms.

effects.result: Mark a character in range. Once a round after that character ends their turn, create a **plant** adjacent to their space.
If that character is *bloodied*, repeat this effect. Foes are additionally *pacified*.

talents.name: i
talents.description: Abilities used against a character marked by growing season gain *slay*: create an Eden vine *terrain effect* in an adjacent space. The vine is *difficult terrain* and a *pit* and creates a **plant** in its space at the start of the round if there isn't already a plant there.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: Abilities used against a character marked by growing season gain *slay*: create a height 1 blood tree object in adjacent space. The tree creates a plant on top of it at the start of the round if there isn't already a plant there.

mastery.name: Soothing Spore
mastery.description: Foes marked by Growing Season are *pacified+* while in or adjacent to spaces occupied by **plants**.

name: Gravebirth
description: Vine and root coil through the deep soil, bringing forth the restless dead.

effects.result:
When you enter this stance, or when it refreshes, Summon a **thrall** in free space in range 2. While in this stance, you have aura 2, with the following effects:
* At the end of your turn, you may consume any *blessing* tokens in the aura to summon one **thrall** in the aura per blessing consumed.
* At the start of your turn, you can prevent up to three thralls in the area from collapsing into **plants**.
Refresh this stance once a round when you trigger a *slay* effect.

talents.name: i
talents.description: When you end your turn, all **thralls** of your choice burrow, removing them from the battlefield, then you may place them in free space in your aura.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: At the end of your turn, you may *sacrifice 2* to summon an additional **thrall**.

mastery.name: Recycle
mastery.description: While Gravebirth’s aura is active, as a *free action* you can cause any two **thralls** in the aura to collapse into **plants** to *cure* an ally in range 4.

name: Harvest
description: You swing with a blade as bright as the new moon.

effects.result: Foes take fray damage. Allies are *blessed*.
Summon a **Thrall** for each foe in the area, and deal 2 *piercing* damage again as an *area effect* to those foes.

talents.name: i
talents.description: Allies in the area also gain 2 vigor, or 4 vigor if Harvest’s Slay effect triggers.

mastery.name: Harvest Moon
mastery.description: When this ability passes through a plant, you can cause that plant to explode, dealing 2 piercing damage in a small blast area effect centered on each plant, and granting its blessing character to yourself or any other ally in range 3 of that plant. Characters can only be damaged by one of these explosions a turn.

name: Blood Grove
description: The wilderness boils with explosive growth, fed by the blood of the battlefield.

effects.result: Grow a medium blast area of undergrowth, with its center space in range. The area is *dangerous terrain* for foes and disappears if you use this ability again.

As long as you are in the area, summon a **thrall** in or adjacent to the area at the end of your turn for each of these conditions you fulfilled this turn:
* Triggered a *slay* effect
* *Sacrificed* as part of an ability
* Are *bloodied*
Each condition can only trigger once.

talents.name: i
talents.description: All spaces of the area cost 0 movement for **thralls** to enter.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: Once on your turn you, while inside the area, you can *sacrifice 2* to extend the area by 2 spaces, adding to its total area on any edge.

mastery.name: Hungry Grove
mastery.description: Each time you summon a **thrall** with Blood Grove, extend the area by 1 space, added to its total area, as long as those spaces are placed adjacent to the area when the effect is triggered.

name: Rot
description: Leaves shrivel. Hair Curls. Wounds fail to heal.

effects.result: Mark a foe in range. While marked, that character cannot be *cured*, cannot gain or benefit from vigor, and gains +1 curse on saves. If that character is at 25% hp or lower when marked, they also lose *defiance*.
Mark an ally in range. While marked, that character has regeneration. If that character is at 25% hp or lower when marked, they also gain defiance.
This mark can be placed even if Rot is already active.

talents.name: i
talents.description: Characters marked by Regenerate gain *comeback*: summon a **plant** in an adjacent space at the start of their turn.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: Foes that start their turn adjacent to a character marked by Rot take 2 *piercing* damage.

effects.result: Mark a character in range 4. If that character would be defeated before the start of your next turn, they are instantly *rescued* after being defeated, then gain a vigor surge and become *unstoppable* until the end of their next turn. Then, even if this effect didn’t trigger, summon a **plant** in an adjacent space to them and end this mark.

name: Crimson BLoom
description: You release a rapidly growing seed of the Thornwillow, the blood-fatted plant of the harvesters whose sap is a powerful intoxicant.

effects.result: Mark a character in range. At the end of any turn that character took damage, or after they attack, set out a d6 power die or increase the die by 1. When the die would tick to 6, consume it. The marked character *sacrifices 6*, but then gains 6 vigor, deals *bonus damage* with all abilities, and becomes *unstoppable* until the end of their next turn.

When the die is consumed, summon a **plant**, and pass this mark to a new character of your choice in in range 3 of the original character. You must pass the mark if possible. If there are no valid characters, the mark ends.

talents.name: i
talents.description: If Crimson Bloom’s damage would reduce an ally to 1 hp or below, they also gain *defiance*.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: Foes at 25% hp or lower sacrifice 10 instead.

mastery.name: Mother Bloodwillow
mastery.description: At round 4 or later, Crimson Bloom becomes a *free action* and its power die starts at 3 ticks.

name: Fairy Ring
description: You cast out a handful of aether-feeding fungi, holy spores that grow into a ringed garden of colorful and deadly mushrooms.

effects.result: Create a ring of mushrooms, a burst 2 (self) *terrain effect*. The ring can be created overlapping any terrain and underneath characters. While the ring is active, gain the following interrupt. The ring lasts until this ability is used again.

sub_effects.result: A foe enters or exits the area.
Teleport that foe 2 and *seal* them. This interrupts but does not end their movement.

talents.name: i
talents.description: Foes cannot gain vigor inside of the ring, and lose all vigor if they start their turn there.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: You can use Spirit Away on allies. If you do, it doesn’t *seal* them.

mastery.name: Spore Shroud
mastery.description: Whenever the rings’ interrupt activates, create a height 1 Megamushroom object anywhere inside or adjacent to the area. The object has a *blessing* token on it and counts as a **plant**, but isn’t removed if the token is removed.

name: Dark Sliver
description: The blade edges of the harvesters are so sharp they can cut the very soul.

effects.result: Cut away a part of the target’s soul, choosing a free space in range 3 of your foe. If the foe is not occupying that space at the end of their next turn, they take 2 piercing damage, are *pacified*, and summon a **plant** in that space.
Create a **plant** in range 3 of your foe.

talents.name: i
talents.description: *Comeback*: Deal bonus damage, and increase all ranges by +1.

mastery.name: Recycle
mastery.description: Dark Sliver can summon a mote of life instead of any regular plant. A mote of life is a **plant**, but becomes a *terrain effect* when its *blessing* is removed. Inside, any ally gains *regeneration* while standing in its space.
